book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲛⲁⲧⲱⲙⲛ̅ⲧ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲙⲁⲁⲩ ⲛⲥ̅ϣⲟⲡϥ̅ ⲉⲣⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲥⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ.
English: And as a mother shall she meet him, and receive him as a wife married of a virgin.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲛⲁⲧⲥⲉϥ ⲟⲩⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲥⲛⲁⲧⲙⲉϥ ⲟⲉⲓⲕ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ.
English: With the bread of understanding shall she feed him, and give him the water of wisdom to drink.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲛⲁⲧⲁϫⲣⲟϥ ⲉϫⲱⲥ ⲛϥ̅ⲧⲙ̅ⲣⲓⲕⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϥⲛⲁⲕⲁ ϩⲧⲏϥ ⲉⲣⲟⲥ ⲛϥ̅ⲧⲙ̅ϫⲓ ϣⲓⲡⲉ.
English: He shall be stayed upon her, and shall not be moved; and shall rely upon her, and shall not be confounded.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲛⲁϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲡⲁⲣⲁ ⲛⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲛⲁⲟⲩⲱⲛ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ.
English: She shall exalt him above his neighbours, and in the midst of the congregation shall she open his mouth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϥⲛⲁⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲕⲗⲟⲙ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲗⲏⲗ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲁϣⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ.
English: He shall find joy and a crown of gladness, and she shall cause him to inherit an everlasting name.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲁⲧⲥⲃⲱ ⲛⲁⲧⲁϩⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲣⲟⲥ.
English: But foolish men shall not attain unto her, and sinners shall not see her.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲟⲩⲏⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧϫⲁⲥⲓ ϩⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉ ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥϫⲓϭⲟⲗ ⲣ̅ ⲡⲉⲥⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ.
English: For she is far from pride, and men that are liars cannot remember her.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲉⲥⲉ ⲡⲉⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲁⲛ ϩⲛ̅ ⲣⲱϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲩⲧⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲟⲩϥ ⲁⲛ ϩⲓⲧⲛ̅ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: Praise is not seemly in the mouth of a sinner, for it was not sent him of the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: For praise shall be uttered in wisdom, and the Lord will prosper it.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲟⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲛⲧⲁⲓ... ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲛⲧ....
English: Say not thou, It is through the Lord that I fell away: for thou oughtest not to do the things that he hateth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲟⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁϥⲡⲗⲁⲛⲁ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲓ̈: ⲛϥ̅ⲣ̅ⲭⲣⲓⲁ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲁⲛ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: Say not thou, He hath caused me to err: for he hath no need of the sinful man.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲙⲉⲥⲧⲉ ⲃⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙⲁⲩⲙⲉⲣⲓⲧⲟⲩ.
English: The Lord hateth all abomination; and they that fear God love it not.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ϫⲓⲛ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲣⲡ̅ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲁⲙⲓⲉ ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲕⲁⲁϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧϭⲓϫ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϣⲟϫⲛⲉ.
English: He himself made man from the beginning, and left him in the hand of his counsel;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲕⲛⲁϩⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲛ̅ⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲕⲛⲁⲣ̅ ⲧⲡⲓⲥⲧⲓⲥ ⲉⲧⲥⲟⲧⲡ̅.
English: If thou wilt, to keep the commandments, and to perform acceptable faithfulness.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲕⲱ ϩⲁⲧⲏⲕ ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲱϩⲧ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲙⲟⲟⲩ: ⲡⲉⲧⲕ̅ⲟⲩⲁϣϥ̅ ⲕⲛⲁⲥⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲧⲟⲟⲧⲕ̅ ⲉⲣⲟϥ.
English: He hath set fire and water before thee: stretch forth thy hand unto whether thou wilt.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲙⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲕ̅ⲟⲩⲁϣϥ̅ ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲧⲁⲁϥ ⲛⲁⲕ:
English: Before man is life and death; and whether him liketh shall be given him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲧⲉ ⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ: ϥⲧⲏⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥϭⲟⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ϥϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉϫⲱⲟⲩ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ.
English: For the wisdom of the Lord is great, and he is mighty in power, and beholdeth all things:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉϥⲃⲁⲗ ϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲉⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲛⲉϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ.
English: And his eyes are upon them that fear him, and he knoweth every work of man.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ϩⲱⲛ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲗ̅ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲉⲣ̅ϣⲁϥⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅.....
English: He hath commanded no man to do wickedly, neither hath he given any man licence to sin.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲉⲡⲓⲑⲩⲙⲓ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲛ.... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲉⲩⲫⲣⲁⲛⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲁⲥⲉⲃⲏⲥ.
English: Desire not a multitude of unprofitable children, neither delight in ungodly sons.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲩϣⲁⲛ...... ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ ⲉϫⲱⲟⲩ: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲟⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲩ ⲁⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲁⲛϩⲟⲩⲧⲕ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲩⲱⲛϩ̅.
English: Though they multiply, rejoice not in them, except the fear of the Lord be with them. (3) Trust not thou in their life,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲕⲁ ϩⲧⲏⲕ ⲉⲡⲉⲩⲁϣⲁⲓ̈:
English: neither respect their multitude:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲟⲩⲁ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉϣⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲧⲣⲉ ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲙⲟⲩ ⲉϥⲟ ⲛ̅ⲁⲧϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉⲧⲣⲉϥⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲁⲥⲉⲃⲏⲥ.
English: for one that is just is better than a thousand; and better it is to die without children, than to have them that are ungodly.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ϭⲱⲣϭⲥ̅ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲧ: ⲧⲉⲫⲩⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲁⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲛⲁϣⲱϥ.
English: For by one that hath understanding shall the city be replenished: but the kindred of the wicked shall speedily become desolate.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡⲁⲃⲁⲗ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲉϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲓ̈ϩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲡⲁⲙⲁⲁϫⲉ ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲛⲉⲧϫⲟⲟⲣ ⲉⲛⲁⲓ̈.
English: Many such things have I seen with mine eyes, and mine ear hath heard greater things than these.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲕⲱϩⲧ̅ ⲛⲁⲙⲟⲩϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲥⲟⲟⲩϩⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲟⲩⲟⲣⲅⲏ ⲙⲟⲩϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲁⲧⲁⲙϩⲧⲉ.
English: In the congregation of the ungodly shall a fire be kindled; and in a rebellious nation wrath is set on fire.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ⲕⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲅⲓⲅⲁⲥ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲣⲡ̅ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩⲡⲱϣⲥ̅ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲩϭⲟⲙ.
English: He was not pacified toward the old giants, who fell away in the strength of their foolishness.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ϯⲥⲟ ⲉⲡⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲗⲱⲧ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩϥⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧϫⲁⲥⲓϩⲏⲧ.
English: Neither spared he the place where Lot sojourned, but abhorred them for their pride.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ......ⲁⲛⲁ ⲁⲛ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩϫⲓⲥⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩⲛⲟⲃⲉ
English: He pitied not the people of perdition, who were taken away in their sins:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ........ ⲉⲩⲙⲉϩⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲃⲁ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩⲥⲱⲟⲩϩ ⲉⲧⲉⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲁϣⲧ̅ϩⲏⲧ
English: Nor the six hundred thousand footmen, who were gathered together in the hardness of their hearts.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲁⲛ ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲛⲁϣⲧⲛⲁϩⲃⲉϥ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲁ ⲟⲩϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲡⲉ ϫⲉ ϥⲛⲁⲟⲩⲟⲡ: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲛⲁ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲟⲣⲅⲏ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ϭⲟⲙ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲉⲕⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁϥⲡⲱϩⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲟⲣⲅⲏ.
English: And if there be one stiffnecked among the people, it is marvel if he escape unpunished: for mercy and wrath are with him; he is mighty to forgive, and to pour out displeasure.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲁϣⲁⲓ̈ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲛⲁ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲟⲛ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϫⲡⲓⲟ: ϥⲛⲁⲕⲣⲓⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ.
English: As his mercy is great, so is his correction also: he judgeth a man according to his works

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲛ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲧⲱⲣⲡ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲑⲩⲡⲟⲙⲟⲛⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲥⲉⲃⲏⲥ ⲛⲁⲱϫⲛ̅ ⲁⲛ.
English: The sinner shall not escape with his spoils: and the patience of the godly shall not be frustrate.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁϥⲕⲁ ⲙⲁ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲟⲩⲁ ⲡⲟⲩⲁ ϭⲓⲛⲉ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ.
English: Make way for every work of mercy: for every man shall find according to his works. (15) The Lord hardened Pharaoh, that he should not know him, that his powerful works might be known to the world. (16) His mercy is manifest to every creature; and he hath separated his light from the darkness with an adamant.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲟⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ϯⲛⲁϩⲟⲡⲧ̅ ⲉⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϫⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲡⲁⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡϫⲓⲥⲉ;
English: Say not thou, I will hide myself from the Lord: shall any remember me from above?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲥⲟⲩⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲁⲛ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲉϥⲟϣ: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲡⲉ ⲧⲁⲯⲩⲭⲏ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲓ̈ⲥⲱⲛⲧ ⲉⲧⲉⲙⲛ̅ⲧϥ̅ ⲏⲏⲡⲉ;
English: I shall not be remembered among so many people: for what is my soul among such an infinite number of creatures?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲓⲥ ϩⲏⲏⲧⲉ ⲉⲓⲥ ⲧⲡⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲡⲉ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲉϥϣⲁⲛϭⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩϣⲓⲛⲉ ϣⲁⲩⲕⲓⲙ.
English: Behold, the heaven, and the heaven of heavens, the deep, and the earth, and all that therein is, shall be moved when he shall visit.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲟ.... ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉϥ....ϣⲣ̅ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲱⲟⲩ .....ⲥⲧⲱⲧ
English: The mountains also and foundations of the earth be shaken with trembling, when the Lord looketh upon them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ....ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲙⲉⲕⲙⲟⲩⲕϥ̅ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲱⲟⲩ: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲉⲛⲉϥϩⲓⲟⲟⲩⲉ;
English: No heart can think upon these things worthily: and who is able to conceive his ways?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ ⲑⲁⲧⲏⲩ ⲉⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲱⲙⲉ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲣⲟⲥ ⲁⲛ ⲡⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲉⲩϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲡⲉⲑⲏⲡ.
English: It is a tempest which no man can see: for the most part of his works are hid.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϣϫⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲇⲓⲕⲁⲓⲟⲥⲩⲛⲏ; ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϭⲱ; ⲧⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲟⲩⲏⲩ.
English: Who can declare the works of his justice? or who can endure them? for his covenant is afar off, and the trial of all things is in the end.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲁⲑⲏⲧ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲉⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲁⲧⲥⲃⲱ ⲉⲧⲡⲗⲁⲛⲁ ϣⲁϥⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲉⲛⲓⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲟϭ.
English: He that wanteth understanding will think upon vain things: and a foolish man erring imagineth follies.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲣⲟⲓ̈ ⲡⲁϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ϫⲓⲥⲃⲱ ⲉⲧⲁⲥⲃⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ϯϩⲧⲏⲕ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲡⲁϣⲁϫⲉ.
English: My son, hearken unto me, and learn knowledge, and mark my words with thy heart.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯⲛⲁⲟⲩⲟⲛϩ̅ ⲧⲉⲥⲃⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲓ ϯⲛⲁⲟⲩⲛϩ̅ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣ̅ⲙⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲱⲣϫ̅.
English: I will shew forth doctrine in weight, and declare his knowledge exactly.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲧⲱϣ ϫⲓⲛ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲣⲡ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ϫⲓⲛ ⲡⲉⲩⲧⲙⲁⲓ̈ⲟ ⲁϥⲡⲣϫ̅ ⲛⲉⲩⲙⲉⲣⲓⲥ.
English: The works of the Lord are done in judgment from the beginning: and from the time he made them he disposed the parts thereof.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲕⲟⲥⲙⲓ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲩⲁⲣⲭⲏ ϣⲁ ⲛⲉⲩϫⲱⲙ.
English: He garnished his works for ever, and in his hand are the chief of them unto all generations:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲇⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩϩⲕⲟ ⲟⲩⲇⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩϩⲓⲥⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲱϫⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ.
English: they neither labour, nor are weary, nor cease from their works.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲉ ⲡⲟⲩⲁ ⲡⲟⲩⲁ ⲑⲗⲓⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱϥ. ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲁⲧⲥⲱⲧⲙ ⲁⲛ ⲉⲡⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ
English: None of them hindereth another, and they shall never disobey his word.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: After this the Lord looked upon the earth, and filled it with his blessings.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ...ⲛⲉⲩⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲟⲛϩ̅ .... ⲡⲉϥϩⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ..........ⲧⲟⲟⲩ.
English: With all manner of living things hath he covered the face thereof; and they shall return into it again.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁϥⲥⲛ̅ⲧ ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲕⲁϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲛ ⲉϥⲛⲁⲕⲧⲟϥ ⲉⲣⲟϥ.
English: The Lord created man of the earth, and turned him into it again.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲏⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲁⲁⲩ ⲛⲁϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϯ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲝⲟⲩⲥⲓⲁ ⲉⲛⲉⲧϩⲓϫⲱϥ.
English: He gave them few days, and a short time, and power also over the things therein.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϯ ϩⲓⲱⲟⲩ ⲛⲟⲩϭⲟⲙ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲣⲟⲟⲩ ⲁϥⲧⲁⲙⲓⲟⲟⲩ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲧⲉϥϩⲓⲕⲱⲛ.
English: He endued them with strength by themselves, and made them according to his image,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲕⲁ ⲧⲉⲩϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲧⲣⲉⲩⲣ̅ϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲑⲏⲣⲓⲟⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϩⲁⲗⲁⲧⲉ.
English: And put the fear of man upon all flesh, and gave him dominion over beasts and fowls.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲃⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲗⲁⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ⲃⲁⲗ ⲙⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ⲙⲁⲁϫⲉ ⲁϥϯ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲁϥⲙⲁϩⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲥⲃⲱ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ.
English: They received the use of the five operations of the Lord, and in the sixth place he imparted them understanding, and in the seventh speech, an interpreter of the cogitations thereof. (6) Counsel, and a tongue, and eyes, ears, and a heart, gave he them to understand. (7) Withal he filled them with the knowledge of understanding, and shewed them good and evil.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲧⲟⲩⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲛⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲁϥⲕⲁ ⲛⲉⲩⲃⲁⲗ ϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲧⲥⲁⲃⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲙⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ.
English: He set his eye upon their hearts, that he might shew them the greatness of his works.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲣⲁⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟ ϫⲉ ⲉⲩⲉϫⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ.
English: He gave them to glory in his marvellous acts for ever, that they might declare his works with understanding. (10) And the elect shall praise his holy name.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Beside this he gave them knowledge, and the law of life for an heritage.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥ.... ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ .... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲥⲁⲃⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲛⲉϥϩⲁⲡ.
English: He made an everlasting covenant with them, and shewed them his judgments.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲛⲉⲩⲃⲁⲗ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲟϭ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲛⲉⲩⲙⲁⲁϫⲉ ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲡⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲥⲙⲏ.
English: Their eyes saw the majesty of his glory, and their ears heard his glorious voice.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϫⲟⲟⲥ ⲛⲁⲩ ϫⲉ ⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲣⲱⲧⲛ̅ ⲉⲡⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲓⲙ: ⲁϥϩⲱⲛ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲁ ⲡⲟⲩⲁ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱϥ.
English: And he said unto them, Beware of all unrighteousness; and he gave every man commandment concerning his neighbour.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲉⲩϩⲓⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛⲓⲙ: ⲥⲉⲛⲁϩⲱⲡ ⲁⲛ ⲉⲛⲉϥⲃⲁⲗ.
English: Their ways are ever before him, and shall not be hid from his eyes.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲕⲁⲑⲓⲥⲧⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲫⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲫⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ: ⲧⲉⲙⲣⲓⲥ ϩⲱⲱϥ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ.
English: Every man from his youth is given to evil; neither could they make to themselves fleshy hearts for stony. (17) For in the division of the nations of the whole earth he set a ruler over every people; but Israel is the Lord’s portion:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲉⲩϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϥⲃⲁⲗ ϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩϩⲓⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: Whom, being his firstborn, he nourisheth with discipline, and giving him the light of his love doth not forsake him. (19) Therefore all their works are as the sun before him, and his eyes are continually upon their ways.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲉ ⲛⲉⲩϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅ ϩⲱⲡ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲩⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: (20) None of their unrighteous deeds are hid from him, but all their sins are before the Lord (21) But the Lord being gracious and knowing his workmanship, neither left nor forsook them, but spared them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲫⲣⲁⲅⲓⲥ ⲛⲉⲙⲁϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϩⲙⲟⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉϥⲛⲁⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲁⲕⲉ ⲛ̅ⲃⲁⲗ.
English: The alms of a man is as a signet with him, and he will keep the good deeds of man as the apple of the eye,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ...ϥⲁⲛ .....ⲃ̅ⲃⲟ... .... ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ.
English: and give repentance to his sons and daughters.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ϥⲛⲁⲧⲱⲟⲩⲛ ⲛϥ̅ⲧⲱⲱⲃⲉ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲛϥ̅ϯ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲧⲟⲩⲉⲓⲟ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲩⲁⲡⲉ:
English: Afterwards he will rise up and reward them, and render their recompence upon their heads.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲧⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲧⲛⲁⲣ̅ϩⲧⲏⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁϥϯ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϩⲓⲏ ⲛ̅ⲕⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲥⲉⲡⲥ̅ ⲛⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲑⲩⲡⲟⲙⲟⲛⲏ.
English: But unto them that repent, he granted them return, and comforted those that failed in patience.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲟⲧⲕ̅ ⲉⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲅ̅ⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲕ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ⲥⲟⲡⲥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲥⲃⲕⲉ ⲛⲉⲕϫⲣⲟⲡ.
English: Return unto the Lord, and forsake thy sins, make thy prayer before his face, and offend less.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲟⲧⲕ̅ ⲉⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲅ̅ⲗⲟ ϩⲁ ⲡϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅ ⲛⲅ̅ⲙⲉⲥⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲃⲟⲧⲉ ⲉⲙⲁⲧⲉ.
English: Turn again to the most High, and turn away from iniquity: for he will lead thee out of darkness into the light of health, and hate thou abomination vehemently.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲁⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲉ; ⲉⲡⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲟⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲧϯ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣ̅ϩⲧⲏϥ;
English: Who shall praise the most High in the grave, instead of them which live and give thanks?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ϣⲟⲟⲡ ⲁⲛ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲙⲟⲟⲩⲧ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲟⲛ ⲉⲧⲉ ⲛϥ̅ϣⲟⲟⲡ ⲁⲛ: ⲡⲉⲧⲟⲛϩ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲙⲟⲧⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: Thanksgiving perisheth from the dead, as from one that is not: the living and sound in heart shall praise the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲧⲉ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϥⲕⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲕⲧⲟ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲣⲟϥ.
English: How great is the lovingkindness of the Lord our God, and his compassion unto such as turn unto him in holiness!

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ϣϭⲟⲙ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲧⲣⲉ ϩⲱⲃ ⲛⲓⲙ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ϫⲉ ⲟⲩϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ ⲁⲛ ⲡⲉ ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ.
English: For all things cannot be in men, because the son of man is not immortal.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉⲧⲟ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ ⲉⲡⲣⲏ; ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲓ̈ ⲕⲉ ϩⲱ .... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲁⲣⲝ ϩⲓ ⲥⲛⲟϥ ϣⲁⲩⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲉ....
English: What is brighter than the sun? yet the light thereof faileth; and flesh and blood will imagine evil.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧϭⲟⲙ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲡⲉⲧϭⲓⲛⲉ ⲉⲡⲉⲥϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ⲕⲁϩ ⲛⲉ ϩⲓ ⲕⲣ̅ⲙⲉⲥ.
English: He vieweth the power of the height of heaven; and all men are but earth and ashes.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲟⲛϩ̅ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲥⲛ̅ⲧ ⲛ̅ⲕⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩⲥⲟⲡ:
English: He that liveth for ever Hath created all things in general.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲙⲁⲩⲁⲁϥ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲧⲙⲁⲉⲓ̈ⲟ. ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ϯ ⲛ̅ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲉϫⲉ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ
English: The Lord only is righteous. (4) To whom hath he given power to declare his works?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϣϩⲟⲧϩⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ; ⲏ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϣⲉⲡ ⲡⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲟϭ; ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϣⲟⲩⲱϩ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ ⲉϫⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲛⲁ;
English: and who shall find out his noble acts? (5) Who shall number the strength of his majesty? and who shall also tell out his mercies?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϣϥⲓ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϣⲟⲩⲱϩ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲉϣϩⲟⲧϩⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: As for the wondrous works of the Lord, there may nothing be taken from them, neither may any thing be put unto them, neither can the ground of them be found out.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣϣⲁⲛ ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ϫⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁϥⲉⲓ ⲣⲱ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϥϣⲁⲛⲕⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲧⲟⲧⲉ ϥⲛⲁⲁⲡⲟⲣⲓ.
English: When a man hath done, then he beginneth; and when he leaveth off, then he shall be doubtful.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉϥϣⲁⲩ; ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲡⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ;
English: What is man, and whereto serveth he? what is his good, and what is his evil?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲏⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲥϣⲁⲛⲁϣⲁⲓ̈ ϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲟⲙⲡⲉ ⲛⲉ.
English: The number of a man’s days at the most are an hundred years.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲧⲗ̅ϯⲗⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲑⲁⲗⲁⲥⲥⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲃⲗ̅ⲃⲓⲗⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲱ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡϣⲱ: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ.
English: As a drop of water unto the sea, and a gravelstone in comparison of the sand; so are a thousand years to the days of eternity.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Therefore is God patient with them, and poureth forth his mercy upon them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲛⲁⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲉⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲡⲉⲩ ...ⲟ ϫⲉ .....: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲁϥⲧⲁϣⲉ ⲡⲉϥ...
English: He saw and perceived their end to be evil; therefore he multiplied his compassion.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲛⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉϣⲁϥⲉⲓ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱϥ ⲡⲛⲁ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉϣⲁϥⲉⲓ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅ ⲛⲓⲙ
English: The mercy of man is toward his neighbour; but the mercy of the Lord is upon all flesh:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥϫⲡⲓⲟ ⲉϥⲡⲁⲓⲇⲉⲩⲉ ⲉϥϯⲥⲃⲱ ⲉϥⲕⲧⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲟϩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲱⲥ.
English: he reproveth, and nurtureth, and teacheth and bringeth again, as a shepherd his flock.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁϥⲛⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ϩⲏⲧⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲥⲃⲱ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲧϭⲉⲡⲏ ⲉⲣⲁⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϩⲁⲡ.
English: He hath mercy on them that receive discipline, and that diligently seek after his judgments.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲧⲱⲗⲙ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲗⲩⲡⲏ ⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲕⲛⲁⲧⲁⲁϥ ⲧⲏⲣϥ̅.
English: My son, blemish not thy good deeds, neither use uncomfortable words when thou givest any thing.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲏ ⲙⲉⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲉⲓⲱⲧⲉ ϯ ⲙ̅ⲧⲟⲛ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲙⲟⲙ; ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲉⲧⲉⲣⲉ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲥⲟⲧⲡ̅ ⲡⲁⲣⲁ ϯ.
English: Shall not the dew asswage the heat? so is a word better than a gift.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲏ ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲁⲛ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉϯ; ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲙⲟⲧ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ⲧⲁϥ ⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲛⲁⲩ.
English: Lo, is not a word better than a gift? but both are with a gracious man.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲥⲟϭ ϣⲁϥⲛⲟϭⲛⲉϭ ⲁϫⲛ̅ ϣⲡ̅ϩⲙⲟⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡϯ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲉⲓⲉⲣⲃⲟⲟⲛⲉ ⲃⲱⲗ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲃⲁⲗ.
English: A fool will upbraid churlishly, and a gift of the envious consumeth the eyes.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲙⲡⲁⲧⲕ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ: ϫⲓ ⲡⲁϩⲣⲉ ⲉⲙⲡⲁⲧⲕ̅ϣⲱⲛⲉ.
English: Learn before thou speak, and use physick or ever thou be sick.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲃ̅ⲧⲱⲧⲕ̅ ϩⲁ ⲑⲏ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲣⲓⲥⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲕⲛⲁϩⲉ ⲉⲩⲕⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲩⲛⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡϭⲙ̅ⲡϣⲓⲛⲉ.
English: Before judgment examine thyself, and in the day of visitation thou shalt find mercy.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲑⲃ̅ⲃⲓⲟⲕ ⲉⲙⲡⲁⲧⲕ̅ϣⲱⲛⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲕⲧⲟ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲉⲕⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: Humble thyself before thou be sick, and in the time of sins shew repentance.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ϫⲣⲟⲡ ⲉϯ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲉⲣⲏⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϭⲱ ⲉⲙⲡⲕ̅ⲧⲙⲁⲓ̈ⲟ ϣⲁ ⲡⲉⲕⲙⲟⲩ.
English: Let nothing hinder thee to pay thy vow in due time, and defer not until death to be justified.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲃ̅ⲧⲉ ⲧⲉⲕⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲉⲙⲡⲁⲧⲕ̅ⲉⲣⲏⲧ; ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲙ̅ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉϥⲡⲓⲣⲁⲍⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: Before thou prayest, prepare thyself; and be not as one that tempteth the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲑⲁⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲃⲁ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲫⲁⲡ.
English: Think upon the wrath that shall be at the end, and the time of vengeance, when he shall turn away his face.
